flawed_nl_solution:
The total percentage the class needs to get is 187.5 because 25 x 0.75 = <<25*0.75=187.5>>187.5
The total percentage the class has absent the one student is <<18.48=18.48>>18.48
The lowest the absent student can get and still have a pizza party is 27% because (187.5-18.48)x 100 = <<(187.5-18.48)*100=16902>>16902
#### 16902

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18.75, not 187.5. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
